thread.title: Make films with social messages Dy CM

title: Make films with social messages Dy CM
text:
Make films with social messages Dy CM 
E-Pao Monday 26th October, 2015 
Imphal, October 25 2015 : Deputy Chief Minister Gaikhangam has urged film makers and producers to give more stress on production of films with strong moral messages.He was speaking at the release event of Sairem Art Creation's latest production Jam Makhong, a Manipuri feature film directed by Sudhir and produced by Jugeshwor Sairem today at Manipur Film Development Corporation auditorium.The motion picture was released ceremoniously by the Deputy Chief Minister at the function today.The Deputy CM expressed desire to see more films based on the State's rich culture and traditions.Not only is Ma...
